skill.name: xlsx
skill.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. When Claude needs to work with spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv, etc) for: (1) Creating new spreadsheets with formulas and formatting, (2) Reading or analyzing data, (3) Modify existing spreadsheets while preserving formulas, (4) Data analysis and visualization in spreadsheets, or (5) Recalculating formulas

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill with minimal audit required. No security issues identified in the scanned files.

content.value_statement: Spreadsheets with formulas often break or show errors after edits. This skill edits files safely and recalculates formulas with error reporting.
actual_capabilities: Recalculates formulas in Excel files using LibreOffice headless mode
Scans all worksheet cells for Excel error values and reports locations
Counts total formulas in a workbook after recalculation
Creates and edits workbooks with formulas and formatting via openpyxl
Reads and analyzes spreadsheet data using pandas workflows
limitations: Formula recalculation requires LibreOffice installed and accessible as soffice
Recalc script targets .xlsx files supported by openpyxl
Very large workbooks may be slow due to full cell scans

use_cases.title: Check model errors fast
use_cases.description: Recalculate a financial model and list all #REF! and #DIV/0! cells for quick fixes.

use_cases.title: Update monthly report
use_cases.description: Modify a template, preserve formulas, and verify all calculations before sharing.

use_cases.title: Validate exports
use_cases.description: Scan generated workbooks for formula errors and count formulas for QA checks.

prompt_templates.title: Recalculate a file
prompt_templates.scenario: You need fresh values in an Excel file
prompt_templates.prompt: Recalculate formulas in report.xlsx and tell me if any Excel errors exist.

prompt_templates.title: Edit with formulas
prompt_templates.scenario: You want edits without breaking formulas
prompt_templates.prompt: Insert a new column for Growth %, add formulas, and keep the existing formatting.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze sheet data
prompt_templates.prompt: Read sales.xlsx and summarize totals by region and month.

prompt_templates.title: Audit a model
prompt_templates.scenario: You want a full formula check
prompt_templates.prompt: Recalculate model.xlsx, list error locations, and report the total formula count.

output_examples.input: Recalculate budget.xlsx and report any errors.
output: Errors: #DIV/0! at Sheet1!F12 and Sheet2!C9; #REF! at Sheet3!B4

best_practices: Use Excel formulas instead of hardcoded values for computed cells
Run the recalculation script after any formula edits
Verify templates match existing formats before changes
anti_patterns: Saving data_only workbooks that replace formulas with values

faq.question: Which spreadsheet formats are supported?
faq.answer: The workflow focuses on .xlsx files; other formats may need conversion to .xlsx first.

faq.question: Are there limits on workbook size?
faq.answer: Large files can be slow because every cell is scanned for errors.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my tools?
faq.answer: Use it with openpyxl or pandas workflows and run recalc.py to refresh formulas.

faq.question: Is my data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No network calls are required; processing happens locally with installed tools.

faq.question: What if recalculation fails?
faq.answer: Check that LibreOffice is installed and the macro setup completed successfully.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual Excel checks?
faq.answer: It provides automated, full-sheet error scanning and formula counts without manual review.
